item.title: How to install WSL on Windows
item.description: Introduction Windows Subsystem Linux (WSL) is an amazing feature that allows users to run full Linux distros directly from Windows. It removes the need to run a virtual machine or restart and select an OS during dualbooting. In this post, we will see how easy it is to install WSL on Windows and get an Ubuntu distribution up and running. Installing WSL Installing WSL can be done by running Powershell (as an administrator) and run the command
